main event: An observer sighted an unidentified object with red, blue, and green lights that increased in altitude and disappeared after approximately 1 minute.
interesting points: The object moved in a straight line at an estimated speed of 20 mph.
The object's description is similar to that of a transparent garment bag hot air balloon.
The observer stated the object did not bear any resemblance to anything they had seen before and moved silently at an extremely high rate of speed.
The observer did not notice any sound, odor, or heat emanating from the object, and it did not disturb the ground or leave any physical evidence.
The observer had not seen this or a similar phenomenon before.
sighted object: an object with red, blue, and green lights
